without richer features.from sentence: The first ablation baseline shows that without richer features as the alignment input , the performance on all datasets degrades significantly .

vanilla residual connections.from sentence: The results of the second baseline show that vanilla residual connections without direct access to the original pointwise features are not enough to model the relations in many text matching tasks .

simpler implementation.from sentence: The simpler implementation of the fusion layer leads to evidently worse performance , indicating that the fu- sion layer can not be further simplified .

parallel blocks.from sentence: In the last ablation study , we can see that parallel blocks perform worse than stacked blocks , which supports the preference for deeper models over wider ones .
